message.body: The diagram was a hit. She said it is exactly what we needed to get this project going. We drew a revised one on the board and she wants me to write it up like I do.
It's like I said yesterday. They wanted a pipeline not an outline (boring! ) you have them exactly what they needed and then some with your aesthetic.
I just send information about the games
Also they emailed us today saying that we should be at the bus at 10:30. I'll probably be helping carry stuff at that time.
